about_the_game:
Twas the Night before Christmas and all through the streets not a creature was stirring but there were some dope beats,
From across the town square, covered in a neon glow the gentleman's club was open and it was time to go.

Frosty's Cold Hard Produce is a an Retro Adventure game. Take off in the small town of Everwinter. Go visit some of the local vendors and build up your arsenal as you take on the snowy planes to face off against Frosty the coldest womaniser and put him on ice.

Features
  • Story Based Narrative
  • Turn Based Creature Battles
  • Mini Games
  • Try to Seduce your future Wifey
  • Collectables
  • More to Add

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains cartoon sexual content,
although most of the sexual content is pixelated player discretion is advised.

name: Frosty's Cold Hard Produce!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce960 or AMD Equivilent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce960 or AMD Equivilent
